Auth.introduction: Bloom informs and empowers survivors by offering remote courses that combine insights on trauma and gender-based violence with therapeutic practices to help heal from trauma.
Auth.loginLink: Already have an account? <loginLink>Go to login</loginLink>
Auth.terms: By continuing, you are indicating that you accept our <policiesLink>Terms of Service and Privacy Policy</policiesLink>

form.contactPermissionLabel: Can we email you for feedback on how to improve Bloom?
form.resetPasswordStep1: We'll send you an email to begin resetting your password.
form.resetPasswordStep2: Almost there! You can now set your new password.
form.resetPasswordSent: Check your emails for a reset link from Bloom. Didn't receive one? Check your junk folder or resend the email.
form.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset! You can now continue to login with your new password.
form.createUserError: There was an error setting up your account. Try again later and <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink> if you're still getting this error.
form.getUserError: There was an error retrieving your account. Try again later and <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink> if you're still getting this error.

codeErrors.internal: There was an error validating your access code. Try again later and <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink> if you're still getting this error.
codeErrors.expired: This code has expired. Get in touch with the {partnerName} team.
codeErrors.invalid: Your access code appears to be invalid. Check for typos or get in touch with the {partnerName} team.
codeErrors.alreadyInUse: This code has already been used. If you think there's been a mistake, get in touch with the {partnerName} team.

firebase.authError: We couldn't find an account for that email and password combination. Check your email and password.
firebase.invalidEmail: Your email appears to be invalid, fix any typos to continue.
firebase.weakPassword: Your password needs to be a little longer, so it's more secure.
firebase.emailAlreadyInUse: This email is already registered with Bloom, go to <loginLink>login</loginLink> to continue.
firebase.invalidCode: This reset password link is invalid, please <resetLink>restart the process</resetLink> and try again.
firebase.expiredCode: This reset password link is now expired, please <resetLink>restart the process</resetLink> and try again.
